content: 5 5 mm hook and tan yarn round 1 leaving 12 in tail chain 10 slip_stitch to join to 1st chain be sure your chain is not twisted 10 round 2 chain 2 does not count 1 double_crochet in each stitch slip_stitch to join to 1st double_crochet 10 round 3 chain 2 does not count increase double_crochet x 4 x 2 slip_stitch to join 12 round 4 chain 2 does not count double_crochet in each stitch around slip_stitch to join 12 round 5 chain 2 does not count increase double_crochet x 5 x 2 slip_stitch to join 14 round 6 chain 2 does not count double_crochet in each stitch around slip_stitch to join 14 round 7 chain 2 does not count * working in front loops only increase double_crochet x 13 slip_stitch to join 15 round 8 chain 2 does not count double_crochet in each stitch around slip_stitch to join 15 finish off leaving a 12 in tail *you should have a tail at the beginning and the end fold the sleeve up at round 7 flo making a cuff take one hand and slip it halfway up into the sleeve using the tail stitch sleeve closed and secure hand in sleeve at same time use main pic as guide finish off and sew in ends collar using 5 5 mm hook and tan yarn round 1 chain 24 slip_stitch to 1st chain to join be sure your chain is not twisted 24 round 2 chain 2 does not count double_crochet in each stitch around slip_stitch to 1st double_crochet to join 24 round 3 chain 2 does not count double_crochet in each stitch around slip_stitch to join 24 tie off leaving 6 in tail sewing using tan yarn line your head up on the center solid circle of the blanket and sew head on grabbing the stitches from head and blanket tie off and hide tail in the head try to line the head up so that the eyes are centered with a corner of the blanket attach ears at top of round 7 of the head and ending with the bottom at round 12 attach sleeves using beginning tail in appropriate place on blanket slip collar over head and use the short tail to tack it to the blanket the collar will naturally fold and cinch around the head finish off and hide all ends www facebook com/lbbcrochet
